title: McAfee
description: McAfee specializes in cybersecurity solutions, ensuring consumers and businesses are protected from online threats. The brand's colors are a staple of its visual identity, prominently featuring Deep Claret (#C01818), Dark Charcoal (#383434), and Pure White (#FFFFFF). These colors reflect its commitment to security, reliability, and clarity. The information about the brand's colors is sourced from their official logo usage guidelines available online.
